name: Take a peek
text: Reveal +1 card during the Exploration Step.

name: Flexible
text: Before gaining a new Skill, reveal +1 Skill card to select from.

name: Dodge
text: After a monster's combat roll spend <Effort> to reduce the roll result by 1.

name: Focus
text: Spend 4 small Efforts and gain 1 medium Effort.

name: Inspiration
text: Spend 2 medium Efforts and gain 1 large Effort.

name: Plan
text: Spend 4 small Efforts and gain 1 Cunning.

name: Craft
text: Spend the required cost to upgrade your weapon.

name: Orienteer
text: Spend one small effort and reveal 2 extra cards during Exploration.

name: Decision step
text: You must make a decision: are you ready to encounter the monster?
